# Class NERFactory

Factory class for creating NER (Named Entity Recognition) instances. Provides methods to create entity recognition models with custom entity definitions.

##### Index

### Methods

createNER

## Methods

### `Static`createNER

  * createNER(entities: [EntityInterface](/interfaces/primitives_ner_entity.EntityInterface)[]): Promise<[NER](./primitives_ner_ner.NER)>

Creates a new NER instance with the specified entities.

#### Parameters

    * entities: [EntityInterface](/interfaces/primitives_ner_entity.EntityInterface)[]

Array of entity definitions to recognize

#### Returns Promise<[NER](./primitives_ner_ner.NER)>

Promise resolving to a new NER instance
